channel.title: Notification: IATI codelists aligned with OECD DAC codelist (last updated 28 Feb 2020)
channel.description:
IATI replicates a number of codelist from the OECD DAC. Following the latest update from the [OECD DAC on 28 February 2020](http://www.oecd.org/development/financing-sustainable-development/development-finance-standards/dacandcrscodelists.htm), we have now aligned the below codelist: * [DAC 5 Digit Sector](http://reference.iatistandard.org/203/codelists/Sector/) * [DAC 3 Digit Sector](http://reference.iatistandard.org/203/codelists/SectorCategory/)
* [CRS Channel Code](http://reference.iatistandard.org/203/codelists/CRSChannelCode/)
Huge thanks to @alex_miller for his work on this and support from @andylolz! Reference to [Github Changes](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Codelists-NonEmbedded/pulls?q=is%3Apr+is%3Aclosed).

item.title: Notification: IATI codelists aligned with OECD DAC codelist (last updated 28 Feb 2020)
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
Thank you for the update @andylolz! Yes, we will be looking at the latest updates in the upcoming weeks and will notify the community when they have been updated on our website.

Read full topic
item.source: Notification: IATI codelists aligned with OECD DAC codelist (last updated 28 Feb 2020)

item.title: Notification: IATI codelists aligned with OECD DAC codelist (last updated 28 Feb 2020)
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
@matmaxgeds thanks for checking. Yes, files including withdrawn codes will pass validation and will also appear in the datastore.

We have not yet included a warning message for withdrawn codes, but will look into this.

Read full topic
item.source: Notification: IATI codelists aligned with OECD DAC codelist (last updated 28 Feb 2020)

item.title: Notification: IATI codelists aligned with OECD DAC codelist (last updated 28 Feb 2020)
item.dc:creator: matmaxgeds
item.description:
Great - can I ask what the guidance is on using withdrawn codes? Will these pass the validator, with just a warning, or if publishers have activities which use withdrawn codes will these activities be invalid IATI and so not appear in the datastore?

Read full topic
item.source: Notification: IATI codelists aligned with OECD DAC codelist (last updated 28 Feb 2020)

item.title: Notification: IATI codelists aligned with OECD DAC codelist (last updated 28 Feb 2020)
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
IATI replicates a number of codelist from the OECD DAC. Following the latest update from the OECD DAC on 28 February 2020, we have now aligned the below codelist:

  • DAC 5 Digit Sector

  • DAC 3 Digit Sector

  • CRS Channel Code

Huge thanks to @alex_miller for his work on this and support from @andylolz! Reference to Github Changes.

Read full topic
item.source: Notification: IATI codelists aligned with OECD DAC codelist (last updated 28 Feb 2020)
